briefRepresentation.description: Boolean which defines whether brief groups representations are returned or not (default: false)

exact.description: Boolean which defines whether the params "search" must match exactly or not

first.description: The position of the first result to be returned (pagination offset).

max.description: The maximum number of results that are to be returned. Defaults to 10

search.description: A String representing either an exact group name or a partial name
